thread.title: Hedge Fund Bridgewater Defends Its ‘Risk-Parity’ Strategy
thread.title_full: Hedge Fund Bridgewater Defends Its ‘Risk-Parity’ Strategy - WSJ

author: Rob Copeland
title: Hedge Fund Bridgewater Defends Its ‘Risk-Parity’ Strategy
text:
A marquee offering from the world’s biggest hedge-fund manager, Bridgewater Associates LP, had its worst month in two years in August, prompting the firm to defend its approach as a solid strategy in good markets and bad.
The $70 billion All Weather fund is down nearly 5% for 2015 through mid-September, and its assets have dropped by...
